Review.Titre: My clients hate having to input their…
Review.Contenu: My clients hate having to input their emails when they receive smart files. There needs to be a way to turn this off. I have so many people complaining about not knowing what email they signed up with or if the accounting department wants to access a proposal. This is really the biggest problem with Honeybook.

Review.Titre: Got a new debit card
Review.Contenu: Got a new debit card. Though I let it default.  When my account defaulted I was forced to pay a higher premium to reinstate. I felt muscled into it. Unfortunately I had to renew because of existing automated payments by existing customers.

Review.Titre: It’s cheeky to not allow other ways for…
Review.Contenu: It’s cheeky to not allow other ways for people to pay besides the business having to reiterate to to the client. You should have way more options for small businesses who don’t want/can afford to pay another fee on money paid on top of the platform fees.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook forces you to pay the 3% transaction fee
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook won’t let you send an invoice or contract without attaching their payment system which charges you 3%. They design it in a way that they make sure they get their 3% when all a customer has to do is send an e-transfer, which is typically free. This also applies for a full paid account - so they’re already getting paid.When asked to disable it they just repeat themselves over and over again and make it sound like they are doing you a favour. The customer should have a choice in how their client pays. I told the customer service rep that by repeating themselves over and over again is not good customer service. Just another example of a greedy corporation taking advantage of a small business trying to keep expenses low to provide the best service to clients!

Review.Titre: We have been locked out of Honeybook…
Review.Contenu: We have been locked out of Honeybook financials for 2 weeks and we have sent numerous emails, BEGGED for a live person to call us and spent over 12 hours trying to resolve and issue to no avail. Honeybook is holding over $2,000 of company money and will not release and NO ONE will help us! This is the WORST software ever and I am just trying out to move all of our records and get away from honeybook!!

Review.Titre: I recently added Honeybook invoicing to…
Review.Contenu: I recently added Honeybook invoicing to my account. After one payment, they told me they needed to do a fraud review before releasing more funds. I supplied the information on March 8, 2023 and was told it would take 5-7 business days before they could release the funds. It's now March 28, 2023 and my money hasn't been released. I've sent email after email, tried connecting with them on their chat and called them. The emails go unanswered, no one responds to the chat and when you get into their phone queue, they hang up on you.My advice, don't trust this company with your payments!

Review.Titre: I do not recommend!!!!
Review.Contenu: I do not recommend!! Customer support is  nonexistent. The software is full of bugs and errors. The flow for the smart file is below average and under developed. It seems like this company is ran by high school kids.

Review.Titre: Honeybook sucks because they didn't…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook sucks because they didn't help me connecting my merchant account.. the took my money and left me hanging.. I DO NOT RECOMMEND this for any SMALL BUSINESS .. stay away from them

Review.Titre: This company is trash AVOID AT ALL COST!
Review.Contenu: This company is trash. Horrible customer service you have to wait hours for a response from the chat. Chat is the only way to get issues resolved. The agents let 30-40 minutes go by before they respond to your response. They will tie up your money!!!

Review.Titre: This company falsely advertises using…
Review.Contenu: This company falsely advertises using ambassadors, customer service reps ignore you when you have questions and with a company who builds business on lies and outsources their lies to others to continuously promote what they have no intention to honor- I think is pretty illegal. After finally getting a rep to respond (thinking I was ignored) she claims the offer is a year old and no longer being honored but yet the ambassadors are promoting this heavily; the most recent video on youtube on 4/13/23. Please have a talk with those who falsely represent your business as this will prevent B2B ongoing trust and partnership.

Review.Titre: A senior executive at HoneyBook…
Review.Contenu: A senior executive at HoneyBook directly contacted a client of a client to grill them on whether or not the client's client had met the HB client. Unethical, if not illegal.

Review.Titre: I have been waiting for Honeybook to…
Review.Contenu: I have been waiting for Honeybook to release my funds and it hasn't yet. Its has been 5 days

Review.Titre: Process fee + time
Need instant transfer options
Review.Contenu: Need instant transfer optionsFalse advertising

Review.Titre: "Appyfying" is still a thing. But doesn't make it a professional solution
Review.Contenu: The interface is modern, but the click-through experience is annoying: to quickly check details written on a contract, it's just too many clicks. It is also confusing how to create a following invoice. Template management is not optimal. And to be honest, I had to explain to clients that the email they received from HB is from us and that they need to click on the link at the bottom of the message to open the contract, sign and pay. It actually causes delays and more work for me. For what it does, I think it is also quite pricey: $18/month plus for every payment that comes through 2.9% + $0.25. That fee should be a capped amount like banks do. That alone drives me looking around for other solutions. Don't get me wrong, I appreciate paying for convenience, but this calculation makes the platform really costly over time. It's a hidden payment you probably don't think about at first.

Review.Titre: got this paid survey from them
Review.Contenu: got this paid survey from themmy gut told me stay awayfirst red flag was no credit card neededthen prompted me for a credit card

Review.Titre: Complicated interface
Review.Contenu: The interface seems a little complicated to me and not so user friendly. Like I'm more of a visual person so I would love a bit more visual and simple representation of steps. Also the dashboard seems a little complicated.

Review.Titre: Too expensive…
Review.Contenu: I used to love and rave about Honeybook. Now its become too expensive and time consuming with the limitations.For example you cant remove/edit items from item bank for building invoices so have to make sure every single line items is correct before sending (NOT TIME SAVING AT ALL) and if you make an edit now there are even more versions being created.  This is still a problem despite saying its a feature that is coming for years.  New builder for proposals is awful and clunky feels very limiting. Really don't like the new branding either but that has nothing to do with the functionality.

Review.Titre: The most critical part of running my business - invoicing - is not working.
Review.Contenu: The onboarding was fairly smooth but the invoicing process has been frustrating and not transparent.  The invoice was marked "paid" by my client 10 days ago, but no money has been received in my bank account despite the fact that the funds have left my client's bank.  This should not take this long for a bank transfer, and the estimated date to deposit keeps changing on my Honeybook interface... To make it worse, it's been 24 hours, and still, no ability to talk to a live person at the company about the issue.

Review.Titre: Looking to cancel Honeybook
Review.Contenu: Overall, I am looking for a new platform to switch to. I am only taking the time to write this review because I have been a honeybook user for many years (six I think!), and have recommended HB to a lot of friends and colleagues. But there are feature requests we have been asking for for years that have been completely ignored - in favor of creating things that people are not asking for (the failure of the "opportunities" feature comes to mind right away). I also was so excited to use smart files and thought they would save so much time, but those have been a disappointment as well and I had to immediately switch back to legacy files.There are also lots of things that are clunky or straight up do not work (like read receipts not working, or inquiry replies going to spam). Lastly, the way the HB team manages the HB users facebook group is an embarrassment. Either comments are completely stifled by not being posted at all, or if something negative/constructive is allowed through, HB is quick to switch off commenting. To me, it seems like HB is more concerned with attracting new users than keeping the ones they have.

Review.Titre: Meh. Better Options Available.
Review.Contenu: Overpriced, not always the most intuitive interface, and I understand they need to make money somewhere - but the cut taken out of every transfer gets tiresome. There are many other services out there doing the same thing better and cheaper.

Review.Titre: Honeybook is Has Very Limited Capabilities
Review.Contenu: When I started with Honeybook I had only a few clients 1-1 support and Honeybook was quick and easy to use.  As I have grown, and added many clients and services, I've worked tirelessly to get the platform to fit the needs of my growing business.  When they added Smartfiles, I was very hopeful.  I have a beautiful brochure and invoice combo.  But, I can't share it with a bulk email.  It makes sense to use Honeybook for a handful of clients.  It is not good for large groups of clients. I don't even know why they allow an upload of hundreds of contacts.

Review.Titre: I'm a new user
Review.Contenu: I'm a new user. The lack of support available is astounding. I'm thinking of going with someone else.

Review.Titre: Not user friendly
Review.Contenu: I like the ideas honeybook has and in theory they sound great, but it's not user friendly and very difficult to learn. I would only recommend honeybook of there was no other platform available.

Review.Titre: I enjoy it, but...
Review.Contenu: I enjoy having all the features in one place. Other platforms are still catching up. However, the entire platform is not user-friendly and sometimes very clunky to use. One example is in regard to contracts. I wrote a completely new contract and included a JPEG of my logo in the document. I was unable to load that document into Honeybook contract templates because that is not a supported feature. I was forced to copy and paste the contract entirely into the templates and then simply type out my logo.

Review.Titre: I am having trouble using some pricing…
Review.Contenu: I am having trouble using some pricing functions and am unable to make invoices through your program.  Would prefer to be able to speak to a person easier than making appointments or through messaging.  The autosave takes a long time and in the middle of creating projects, so unable to get things done quickly and efficiently.

Review.Titre: I like the way Honeybook works however…
Review.Contenu: I like the way Honeybook works however there are SOOO many glitches when it comes to syncing with Quickbooks. I no longer want to accept payments through Honeybook as it causes many issues with bookkeeping and reconciliation.

Review.Titre: Lots of good things but one issue
Review.Contenu: I'm loving a lot of things about Honeybook but have had issues with clients receiving emails or messages from the platform

Review.Titre: The sales pitch was strong, and contained empty promises.
Review.Contenu: Overall, it's a great help to my business, but when I was signing up, the sales pitch was strong, and there were a lot of features that were promised to be imminently forthcoming but still have not materialized.  It's been a couple years now.

Review.Titre: Invoice and payment schedule
Review.Contenu: Definitely it is great having all correspondence in one file and accessible to all parties.  The fact that customers who make additional payments falling outside of their "prearranged pay schedule" require a new schedule to be submitted (vs just showing a credit towards the next payment) is a royal pain.  This could be made so much easier.

Review.Titre: It's an okay service but too expensive…
Review.Contenu: It's an okay service but too expensive for what is offered. The monthly fees are too much, and the transaction fees are too much. I will be looking for another provider.

Review.Titre: It’s good but not worth the price
Review.Contenu: It’s good but not worth the price. It’s lacking a lot of useful features, if you want invoicing and contracts there are cheaper options.

Review.Titre: I’ve had several issues with your…
Review.Contenu: I’ve had several issues with your application recently where I’m not getting inquiries or I’m not getting email responses back or it says you sent my email to my client and then they never receive it or it goes to spam. As a business owner I heavily rely on my emails, and a little disappointed that I pay so much money for it to Not get sent or received.

Review.Titre: My client said they never received the…
Review.Contenu: My client said they never received the invoice and reminders, even though they were eager to pay me. It only worked when I sent them a link.

Review.Titre: Love Honeybook- just one thing..
Review.Contenu: So far I love Honeybook. It's got an excellent workflow system in place and helps you out a ton. It keeps you super organized, on top of all of your projects, and really helps you create contracts, invoices, questionnaires, testemonial requests, you name it!Ok now what it lacks-the reason I give them 3 stars, is their payment system. They charge you a 3% FEE on every payment given by your clients. Now, I'm a wedding photographer. You do the math, but taking 3% of a $2500 wedding photography charge-is a good chunk of change. One that I'm not ever allowing my clients to use again. So until they change that, and either drop the fee to 1% like every other payment platform out there (Paypal, Venmo), or integrate those other payment transfer companies onto their app and website-it'll be a 3 star rating for me. My recommendation for anyone wanting to invest in Honeybook-DO IT! It's a great company, but just tell your clients to only pay you cash, or through venmo and paypal. Don't make the same mistake as me and lose almost $100 on a deposit for a wedding because I was unaware of their ridiculous fee.

Review.Titre: I love HoneyBook
Review.Contenu: I love HoneyBook. It's my favorite platform to use in my business. There's a lot of incredible features that really have helped elevate and streamline my Client Flow. I'll always be promoting and using the platform. With that said, I don't love the direction the company has gone this year. I feel like there's a lot of effort being put into new features or avenues with the system when the current features we have don't even work the way they should all the time. There's data linking that has dead ends, glitches happening constantly, so many issues with the scheduler, and basic things we should be able to change in system settings that cause a lot of manual work. I would much prefer to see the team fine tuning what is already there instead of trying to add new things like banking or changing branding that didn't need to be changed. The customer service team has gone so far downhill this year. Wait times are insane, it's taken me days to solve problems sometimes and usually it's me following up with them a ton to get a response before anything is done. It seems like there's a lot of focus on growth and the team is loosing sight on the details that brought people into the platform in the first place. Again, I'm not going anywhere. I LOVE HB. But I am disappointed to see how things have gone this year. I do know things are changing, and I am aware a lot of hard work is being put in which I really appreciate so I have hope this is just a bump in the road that we will soon see smoothed out.

Review.Titre: Its great other than how much of a…
Review.Contenu: Its great other than how much of a percentage it takes out plus charges each month.

Review.Titre: A great solution for an entry-level service provider—with some drawbacks
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is a great solution for an entry-level service provider. In many ways, it's the perfect all-in-one tool with excellent customization of your proposals, invoices, client questionnaires, and more. I've also found customer service to be very responsive. (Although I recently found out I'm on a legacy plan that includes priority customer service. I have no idea what it's like for others on the newer version of my plan.)That said, there are some real limitations that keep it from being as wonderful as it could be. A lot of the UX is clunky and confusing. One example: I still cannot get the order of operations right in my brain that when I want to send an email to a client that contains a file, I can't just choose an email template and then create/add the file. I have to create the file first, then select the email template. Sounds basic, right? It is. But that's what UX is for—being intuitive. Also, navigation back to the main menu sucks when you're inside a project file. Basic stuff.I also have no use for the automations, because I need different things to happen for different offers, and there's no customization for the triggers. (Why does HoneyBook allow you to have multiple forms, yet when you select a form trigger for an automation, there's no way to specify WHICH form triggers the action?) I've worked with some other systems in the past that had really robust automations, triggers, and rules. There's so much potential, but right now, this feature is of no use to me.I'm hopeful that changes are in the works, because while I've considered switching to Dubsado, I know that would come with its own set of challenges and drawbacks. I'd love to know what's ahead on HB's roadmap of feature updates. That would help people like me who need more out of the tool to stay on board.

Review.Titre: Good Interface, Difficult to Get Started
Review.Contenu: The interface is good and aesthetically pleasing. Onboarding wasn't helpful at all and navigating how to create my own smart files has been all trial and error.

Review.Titre: I came to HoneyBook from Dubsado after…
Review.Contenu: I came to HoneyBook from Dubsado after 2 years. One of the main factors that lead me to this was the additional cost I was paying for my alias companies. The standard fee is about the same now (even though 2 years ago Dubsado was much cheaper). The second factor was the HoneyBook app. I am an avid user of mobile devices and having an integrated app if for nothing but invoicing, contract signing, or responding to inquiries is a lifesaver.After using HoneyBook for a few months I'm definitely becoming familiar with what it is lacking. First and foremost is the payment system. Not being able to integrate Paypal or any other ecomm platform sucks. Not being able to access funds immediately if necessary is a bummer and so is HoneyBook's added processing fee. In addition, the UI while very intuitive and sleek is lacking a lot of personalization options that I miss with Dubsado. For example, being able to create interactive order forms with user-defined is EXTREMELY MISSED. I like being able to give the customer the choice of choosing their own package and having it auto process to my invoice and workflow. Or just sending BASIC forms with images within the project flow, this would at least allow me to send drafts for approval. WHYYYY would that not be included in a system catering to the creative industry????Workflow on HoneyBook is something I have not had much time to figure out. It doesn't appear as if I can send custom payment confirmation emails which would make workflow completely useless to me. Again, I have not dived that deep into Workflow as of yet. With email communication being an integral part of my business, not being able to send client emails from my personal webmail address is just ridiculous! HoneyBook really drops the ball in enabling paying customers to customize and personalize their CMS system and they really brand the hell out of it.Unfortunately, there are other smaller issues like not having the Time Tracker on the app, not being able to send estimates vs. invoices, not having an integrated booking system (I believe you need a third-party service). And more! These are extreme trade off's for the ease-of-use and intuitive system that HoneyBook does provide. Once my promotion period ends, I will have a SERIOUS decision to make on moving forward with HoneyBook.

Review.Titre: I love how smooth and convenient my…
Review.Contenu: I love how smooth and convenient my clients experience is with HoneyBook. I would love a feature to add images to the notes section instead of just text. That would be awesome!

Review.Titre: I love the ease of the process
Review.Contenu: I love the ease of the process, however, I wish there weren’t any transaction fees since I’m already paying a monthly fee.

Review.Titre: interfaces are user friendly!
Review.Contenu: All interfaces are so user friendly. Provides CRM, project Management and payment functions! Love it!

Review.Titre: On Brand!
Review.Contenu: The setup is a little daunting...I haven't fully figured it out! BUT I love the custom look of the proposals, contracts, services, and invoices! I wish you could move the text boxes and images/logos a little more freely on the page!

Review.Titre: I have enjoyed working with HB so far
Review.Contenu: I have enjoyed working with HB so far. It is a little clunky getting started, but I figured it out. I would like to see more of a CRM approach to retaining clients' information and also being able to email them easier. A place for making follow up notes with their contact information would be nice too.

Review.Titre: I love that my projects are organized…
Review.Contenu: I love that my projects are organized and flow through stages that make sense. Invoicing, proposals, online payment, templates, and the calendar all make customer service easy.There are some things that I would change. I would like to have the option of a csv file with only online payments for my annual reports, since I use "mark as paid" for payments made in my store.I wish projects could move stages automatically based on actions I choose.I wish I could take reservations for my restaurant through an integration on my website.I wish it was easier to modify invoices and proposals on the app.There are other things I would change, but don't remember it until I'm using that feature.I definitely have made a whole lot more sales simply because of HoneyBook!

Review.Titre: Is there anyway to make the link of any…
Review.Contenu: Is there anyway to make the link of any smart files that go to the client say a custom URL and not honeybook. I love honeybook, but I'd love to have a more seamless experience with my brand and the client. Other then that amazing!

Review.Titre: Just 1 option short of 5 stars
Review.Contenu: Great service the only 1 star less is the inability to upload documents and instantly be able to edit them as needed. Unless that was something updated that i don't know about  if it was then I'd give 5 stars as it would be the perfect app for me. But 4 stars is still impressive

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: I found Honeybook to be very user-friendly. Having access to so many templates is also very helpful and makes it simple to customize it.

Review.Titre: Overall I love honeybook but my only…
Review.Contenu: Overall I love honeybook but my only suggestion is this:It would be really nice to be able to duplicate expenses. I have some recurring monthly expenses and its very time consuming to enter them manually.

Review.Titre: Honeybook is so easy to use and learn…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is so easy to use and learn because it’s a minimal platform that tackles major processes. With honeybook you are the admin team AND if you have a team, co-op works like a breeze with the assign teammate functions. Organization and adaptability is the key to everything in the service.

Review.Titre: We love HB
Review.Contenu: We love HB. Very easy to use and we recommend. The main drawbacks are it takes way to long to refund payments and automations cant be applied from mobile. Cant attach photos or files from mobile device.

Review.Titre: Honeybook is a great one-stop solution…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is a great one-stop solution for small business owners. It eliminates the need for multiple platforms and provides so much value for the price point.

Review.Pseudo: DJ Buddy & Let's Party! DJs  of South Florida
Review.Titre: Perfect, Except
Review.Contenu: Absolutely love this program and it does ALMOST everything I've been looking for for ages.  I've been in the DJ business, booking multiple services for 33 years now, and the program I've been using is 25 years old!!!  This does MOST of it, and quickly.The only thing I'd add to it is a staff/subcontractor option.  I don't want to share my info/assignments, and most of all what I'M getting paid with employees or contractors.  Otherwise, perfect...

Review.Titre: I have been using HoneyBook for almost…
Review.Contenu: I have been using HoneyBook for almost 2 years. It’s truly changed my business! Longtime clients have commented on how easy it is to use on their end & they love being able to pay directly through the invoice. I enjoy the experience and being able to easily access everything and customize for the most important things to be done that make my business my own.  A few things I wish could be added would be just for my bank transfer clients, adding a “I’m paying via bank transfer” option that directs them to a bank choices or to just click and have the invoice process without the emails asking if everything came through. An awesome upgrade would be a more tax friendly booking keeping service BUT I know there are options out there for it.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is AMAZING!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is AMAZING!The system is my one stop shop for everything I need to run my business with the exception of two things. One, I wish that I could process orders with my lab with HoneyBook to streamline the entire process for my clients. Two, I wish there was a way to sell/process actual gift cards

Review.Titre: I honestly love Honeybook
Review.Contenu: I honestly love Honeybook! It has been such a game changer for my business. My clients love how beautiful my proposals are and how everything is so organized. I love that I can automate so many parts of the client relationship process and still provide quality customer service. Honeybook is constantly working to listen to their customer feedback and make changes. I am patiently waiting to have instant account payment capabilities and to be able to use the app in a tablet or phone in a landscape orientation so that I can use a keyboard to work on my proposals. If there was a back end business portion like for rentals and inventory that would be awesome. I can’t wait to see what they upgrade next. They always knock it out of the park!

Review.Titre: I LOVE HoneyBook…
Review.Contenu: I LOVE HoneyBook and recommend it to everyone I know. I love being organized and this helps me do it. However I am very thankful to have gotten into the original pricing. I think the current price is a hard sell. Other than that no complaints.

Review.Titre: I love that I can keep up with revenue…
Review.Contenu: I love that I can keep up with revenue for the year. Great management tool for my floral business. I’m still learning how everything works. I just haven’t learnt how to get more leads yet? I have and will recommend HoneyBook to professionals.

Review.Titre: Not Perfect But Still Very Useful!
Review.Contenu: It is definitely a great tool to stay organized with!  I could use a few features geared more towards my DJ gigs, and sometimes it gets a little tricky to navigate, but nothing too difficult and my clients enjoyed using the app to communicate and pay me!

Review.Titre: Honeybook is my go to recommendation…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is my go to recommendation for a client mgmt system as a creative. There are lots of useful things - the easy to use messaging system, the ability to upload files and set up documents directly in the app or online. The templates are great and the immediate direction to pay is even better. The auto pay feature is great. There are some things I don't love - the app is difficult to send contracts in because of the way it's set up for Android, it's buggy and not as easy as it could be. The limited apps for mobile compared to desktop is frustrating but I understand it takes time. I just don't understand why basic features are still not adapted in the year and a half I've used HB. The inability to shut off auto-pay for my client (I've had three who I had to send "how to" guides because they don't understand why they have to turn it off) is annoying. The calendar could definitely be improved, I used to use setmore and it was great it just made it too complicated to use both as then I'm getting emails through two services and I need something streamline I don't have to pay so much extra for. HB is STILL the way to go as I've tried lots of other programs, but it is still a work in progress. I look forward to new features as things progress!

Review.Titre: Honeybook is Great, Kinda Pricey though
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is Great, would have given it a 5 Star however, the price is kind of high.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook has been a great tool
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has been a great tool.  It took sometime to get used to the dynamic, but overall clients are fairly happy with the results.

Review.Titre: Awesome features and great customer service
Review.Contenu: love the features that honeybook offers. Which the fees were a little less.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is great for managing clients!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is great for managing clients and sending all the documents and contracts I need for my photography business. It’s helped me keep track of my bookkeeping, keep professional communication, and stay organized!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook Pro (and Fan)
Review.Contenu: I enjoy partnering with HoneyBook and offering it to my clients as a comprehensive tool to use in their business.

Review.Titre: A few additional capabilities needed
Review.Contenu: It has a few additions to capabilities that could be extremely helpful, but overall, already more helpful than my prior lack of systems before.

Review.Titre: Honeybook was a dream come true at…
Review.Contenu: Update (01/11/23)A person from the Honeybook team directly reached out to me, and having her as my advocate helped me feel at ease. I decided to move all of my payments to Stripe instead of using Honeybook for payment processing and sending invoices and that made a world of difference. I have stayed with Honeybook as a customer since then, and everything else has been running so much more smoothly now that I have made the decision to have my payments processed elsewhere.Of course, I would love to have Honeybook be everything for my business - but with all it has to offer, I still find the value incredible. Updating my rating from two stars to four now!-(5/25/2022) Honeybook was a dream come true at first. Having an "all in one" place for contracts, payment, scheduling, and project management was seriously such a relief as a one person small business.Now I write this review not to discredit the good, because when it works it works so well. But when you have issues? It's a nightmare. The Support Team, while well meaning, take hours to respond and I would not mind that IF I left those conversations with a solution in hand. I have had two autopay payments fall through the cracks and have had to email my clients back and forth for two weeks because they can't seem to tell me what the issue is. They just respond saying "tell them to click pay" which I have done THREE times now over the last two weeks. Now, I have a frustrated client that is ready to leave my business which is $4,000 that I am losing because of this issue. Now, I have another issue where another client's autopay is skipping a month and I would not have noticed and have lost that money, too if the clients didn't mention it to me!This is unacceptable and I am sad to say I will be cancelling my membership with Honeybook. Additionally, the fact that collecting payments and setting up autopay is incredibly difficult with their smart files and I have to restart the whole file IF I were to re-send an invoice and have to have clients do the same thing again: sign the contracts and input their payment details AGAIN for the fourth time is making my life as a small business owner difficult.I have lost time, money, and energy with Honeybook which is the antithesis of what their product is supposed to do for me as a small business owner.I really do hope they improve. In theory, the product is amazing. When it works it works, like I said. When it doesn't? You're on your own, left with very little help, and zero solutions.

Review.Titre: It's a little confusing but I like it
great service so far.
Honeybook makes my business stremlined…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook makes my business stremlined and automatex. I love the customizations and workflows!

Review.Titre: I have trouble with the automated…
Review.Contenu: I have trouble with the automated emails.

Review.Titre: The simple version is i had a huge…
Review.Contenu: The simple version is i had a huge banking issue. HoneyBooks team was not only responsive but went above and beyond to assist me.

Review.Titre: Great CRM
Review.Contenu: I'm really enjoying what HoneyBook provides in a CRM. I know I have a lot more to learn, but I've found it to be very useful to my business.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook makes everything simple
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook makes everything so simple… between the automation emails, the scheduling system, allowing you to customize contracts, and see if an email has been read and keeps your updated on the status of projects. It’s just such an easy client managment website. Truly worth every penny!

Review.Titre: So far it's been great
Review.Contenu: So far, it's been really great. The interface needs to be streamlined a little as I am having a hard time figuring out templates and getting my documents lined up, but generally, it's amazing. I could use some more contract templates and whatnot, but I'll make due. Well worth the money at this point.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is a phenomenal one-stop shop for small businesses…
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is a phenomenal one-stop shop to helping small businesses streamline their booking process. It makes me so happy!I have a much easier peace of mind when it comes to the booking process now than when I started my business three years ago.

Review.Titre: Honeybook helps me stay organized
Review.Contenu: Honeybook helps keep my business in order! I don't know where I would be without it. It helps me manage all things client related -- emails, invoices, questionnaires, contracts, scheduling, tasks, and lots more. I love having everything in one place and can refer back to important information whenever needed.

Review.Titre: Great platform for small business owners like us!
Review.Contenu: I really like this app and platform. It really has helped us to stay organize and make sure that we install our yard signs on time and ensure proper communication with our clients to make sure that their orders are correct. I would 100% recommend Honey book and like the new incorporation of AI into the system. We have not needed to use it but I can definitely see it helping other businesses to save time.

Review.Titre: Very user friendly
Review.Contenu: Very user friendly and easy to get things set up, As a small business you want to be able to offer this level of service without a crazy price tag and HoneyBook delivers on that 100%

Review.Titre: Finally decided to go for it
Review.Contenu: I've tossed around the option to use Honeybook for a while.  Utilizing the free account, at first, everything seemed too complicated so I didn't pursue it.  Now that I have implemented short-term services, Honeybook fits GREAT with that part of my business structure.  It works well with short-term clients.

Review.Titre: Great tool for creatives in the business World.
Review.Contenu: Great platform for CRM. As a photographer/videographer I appreciate all the tools available to creatives that allow us to stay on top of our business. I’ve been using the platform for 3 years.

Review.Titre: Being able to track clients & send…
Review.Contenu: Being able to track clients & send proposals & invoices. The smart files & the ability to make them more visual if appealing have been an amazing addition. Streamlining the process with the scheduler now being able to go in with the smart files has been a game changerThe only thing I’d like to see, is ability to create an edit via mobile

Review.Titre: I love HoneyBook
Review.Contenu: I love HoneyBook. I have created my automatic system for my clients and I don't have to do anything else. They even have HoneyBook Pros to help with your business or automation if you're not the creative type. Everything I need Honeybook has. I can even receive payments as well. Don't wait, just get HoneyBook now!

Review.Titre: Best Ever
Review.Contenu: Everything has been super easy to do, which is great for a novice like me. I was nervous about how I was going to be able to successfully run a freelance business, but so far it's been a breeze thanks to honeybook!

Review.Titre: Seriously ridiculous! In the best way!
Review.Contenu: Seriously ridiculous! HoneyBook has made managing my business A BREEZE! What would normally take me HOURS out of my day to do, things like contracts, email templates, proposals, invoices, etc, now takes me minutes. Frankly, sorry to be crude, but if you own a business of any sort and have clients of any sort, offer any kind of service, and you DONT have HoneyBook, you’re just really really not smart :)

Review.Titre: I really love the ease of use and the…
Review.Contenu: I really love the ease of use and the convenience of having all my projects and files in one main area. I 10/10 recommend hiring a HoneyBook Pro to improve your experience. I am using Luneer Mgmt. and cannot say enough good things about the team!

Review.Titre: Provided Unimaginable Growth!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has become an essential tool in my business! I can't believe how much I have grown and flourished because of its workflows. I've even had prospects compliment me about the ease of reaching out and getting started!

Review.Titre: Very user friendly
Review.Contenu: Very user friendly. Site offers a variety of different avenues for learning and for use that fits the client. I took part in the initial "Beginner's" class - Intro to Honeybook and it was really helpful. You do a great job at helping people learn at a pace that works for them.

Review.Titre: amazing platform - tons of tools - great for client payments
Review.Contenu: amazing platform - tons of tools - great for client paymentsit's a great platform but I want to call out the customer support for being the best, most responsive group I've ever encountered - I don't any other company like honeybook can really match it ... they must put a lot of resourcing into this part of their business.once you get fully setup within honeybook, it really flows and life just gets easier

Review.Titre: Best Event-Based CRM & Automation Tool I've Seen
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has been a great addition to my business!  Hands-down, the best value in a CRM/Automation tool for an Event-Based businesses that I've seen in my 8 years as a CTO at an entertainment company.  What you get feature-wise for the cost is an incredible value, the fact that this is one of the ONLY online tools that offers "date-based" booking is huge.  Of course, not EVERYTHING is customizable/changeable, but HB provides quite enough to get the job done & save on tons of admin time, especially given the cost.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is life & business saving!
Review.Contenu: I love HoneyBook & recommend it to every entrepreneur I meet! I think if I wasn’t using HoneyBook I probably wouldn’t still be in business! It helps keep all my projects in order & doesn’t let me double book myself or miss anything. It also helps me automate my business with the Workflow feature. If you’re not using HoneyBook, you’re missing out on a life changing CRM!

Review.Titre: You make it so easy to get paid...
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t run my small business without you. HoneyBook eliminates administrative tasks that would take me away from my creative work. Thank you for making it so easy to get PAID! (Insert money gif here) - Ashley Taylor, Napa Note Calligraphy

Review.Titre: Honeybook has changed my entire…business!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has changed my entire workflow, everything used to be through Word, Paypal, Gmail, and Google Drive, now it's all in one place and my clients love how easy it is to work through the process of booking me. It's made my whole business model so much easier. Everything is in one place under their names, so I can easily go back and track our email interactions, invoices and proposals. It's been the best decision to switch to HoneyBook! And most of all, my clients are extremely happy with the whole process!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is like my personal assistant!
Review.Contenu: It's like my personal assistant for admin type work. Great if you work alone or with a small team. Helps relieve pressure of collecting payments by making it easy for you and the person on the other end.

Review.Titre: The BEST CRM for Service Providers!
Review.Contenu: I am a service provider that has been using HoneyBook since I launched my business. HoneyBook has been key to the success of my business and has allowed me to scale and grow so quickly. What I love most about HoneyBook is that they listen to their customers and continue to improve their software.

Review.Titre: Honeybook is the best decision I made for my business this year!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has totally transformed my business for the better! I'm so much more organized and have peace of mind about where I am in the process with each client or potential client. I have created workflows that allow me to give EVERY client the same high-level experience which, in turn, has gotten me raving referrals for more business! It's so user-friendly and I adore having everything in one place. I can't recommend it enough!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is the Best Small Business Tool
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook makes running my photography business sooooo much easier. The auto reminders for clients alone is worth it. Contracts are gorgeous, you can see when clients read your emails. Best small business took out there.

Review.Titre: Without HB I was struggling
Review.Contenu: I've tried to run my business without Honeybook. Let's just say it was harder trying to do everything on separate platforms and places. Honeybook has allowed me to keep most of everything in one place. However, I think it is a bit pricy.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is the best!!!
Review.Contenu: I SWEAR by HoneyBook! From Day One, I've been able to ensure a smooth, streamlined process for each and every client while also ensuring legal compliance and safety. I keep getting feedback from old and new clients how safe and secure they feel working with me because of HoneyBook's encrypted system and file protection. I've even been able to help colleagues navigate difficult situations and HoneyBook is always there to guide, support, and advocate through complications. I strongly promote this CRM to all my professional colleagues!

Review.Titre: How did I live without Honeybook?
Review.Contenu: I began with Honeybook at the beginning of this year. Looking back on past years of running my business, I have no idea how I managed without Honeybook! They make it incredible easy to keep track of my work flow and send invoices to my clients. Whenever I have questions, Honeybook staff are quick to reply and are always sending helpful emails with tips on how to better my business and utilize Honeybook to its full capactiy. Thanks, Honeybook!

Review.Titre: GAME CHANGER
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has completely changed my business and workflow for the best. It has streamlined my process with clients and is seriously life changing! Invoices, contracts, automated workflows and so much more. I can’t imagine how I could stay on top of everything without it! It is so worth the investment. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I've used HoneyBook from almost their…
Review.Contenu: I've used HoneyBook from almost their inception and I am so happy with the years of service they have provided! The application keeps getting better with more services and tools to help wedding planners and our affiliates! I credit our fantastic growth and reputation to the support of the team at HoneyBook! I can't imagine doing my business without this fantastic tool! Cathy O'ConnellCOJ Events

Review.Titre: I'm not easy to please technologically
Review.Contenu: I'm not easy to please technologically, but wow, do they make me happy. Really! I feel nothing but gratitude using their web app. Stunning UI & UX, probably the best in their industry. Phenomenal logic on their layout and functionality. Overall I'm just super duper pleased. Yes, they have a long easy to go and many improvements to make, but that doesn't take away from bottom-line beauty of today. And today, they save me so much time with their templates and automation. Honeybook makes me enjoy managing clients and projects. Really next level. Okay, I'll stop now. Lol. For real though, I'm that happy!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook has been amazing for my business!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has been amazing for streamlining my business processes!  Not only has HoneyBook helped me create efficient workflows, HoneyBook has helped me save so much time by being able to have a one stop shop for everything.  All of my contracts, email templates, invoices, and proposals are all in one spot with my branding and it has been a lifesaver.  Thank you HoneyBook for being so awesome!

Review.Titre: I’ve been with Honeybook since it…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been with Honeybook since it launched, and I love how much easier it’s been to run my business with it. Five years ago, I started setting up Honeybook for other wedding professionals, too.

Review.Titre: It is such a great feeling to open up…
Review.Contenu: It is such a great feeling to open up just one website and have all of my clients information and billing, contracts and other vendors in one portal. Saves me a ton of time from hunting down emails and it is great to know when a client has received and even opened a document. Thanks honeybook!

Review.Titre: The Best Tool!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has become one of the best tools to use as a professional photography company! The easy-to-navigate system + the quick respond with their troubleshooting team is amazing!

Review.Titre: Love Honeybook
Review.Contenu: Love Honeybook! It is a core tool for my business and allows me to professionally connect with clients. It's easy-to-use interface and automation make it super powerful and helps me save time. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I absolutely love Honeybook
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love Honeybook!  It allows me to manage everything in one place saving me time.  Now I spend more time with clients and less time behind the computer.  The templates are beautiful, it is so user friendly and the concierge is always there to help.  The tutorials are easy to follow as well.  I have recommended Honeybook to all my colleagues.

Review.Titre: An answer to end the madness
Review.Contenu: There was a point in my business where I was using so many programs, platforms, and programs that I literally would take hours to setup a proposal for a client. Not to mention the nightmare it was to collect payment. A colleague told me about HoneyBook and I checked it out. Even after what will soon be 5 years, I still won’t use any other tool. And in those 5 years, HoneyBook has just gotten better and better and works together with so many other platforms, it’s become easier and easier to run this portion of my business.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook helps me run my business!
Review.Contenu: I love using HoneyBook! It helps keep my business organized and running smoothly. I love all the features, especially the all-in-one proposal. My clients have made comments about how easy it is on their end too - to sign agreements and pay invoices.

Review.Titre: Takes the Hassle Out
Review.Contenu: Honeybook helps make my workflow so much more organized. I can email clients, send contracts, proposals and brochures all from this website. It’s a one stop shop and makes my life so much easier. I can’t imagine my business without it.

Review.Titre: 100000% Recommend Honeybook
Review.Contenu: 100000% Recommend Honeybook. The best client management system ever. Not only does the customer service ROCK but this company is always striving to do better and be better. They take all suggestions to heart and almost always add new features based on user suggestion. In actual terms of using HB, my clients book faster and always comment how impressed they are with how simple and streamlined the process was for them. HoneyBook has helped me stay organized, work more efficiently and even keep record of how well I am doing. Would never go anywhere else! I have been a member for 5+ years!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook...Cannot Work Without It!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is the best platform to keep your service business organized. As a wedding planner I can do multiple tasks at once as well as send multiple emails to all clients if need be. It tracks every aspect of your business and gives you the tools necessary to grow. With the compatability of HoneyBook with email as well as website it is a must have! I learn something new everyday and with updates and the HoneyBook team always inovating it becomes easier and easier to provide your clients with not only a personal touch but fast and acurate responses. Organization is key to sucess and HoneyBook provides me that key. I cannot believe I ever worked with out it.

Review.Titre: Honey Book for Our Wedding Venue
Review.Contenu: Honey Book has been great. We used to do all of our contracts, payments and  invoices manually. We knew we needed to get into the 21st century and allow our clients to access everything online but didn't know what would be best for our wedding venue. As soon as we found Honey Book we knew this would be the right software and company for us. We have been using Honey Book now for 6Months and have loved every minute of it. The ease for us and our clients has been wonderful. The reminders and direct payments have saved us hours of time each month.

Review.Titre: I just love Honeybook
Review.Contenu: I just love Honeybook! It's made the workflow of running my own business clean and seamless. From the backend of putting everything together to how to clients view it, everything is on brand and easy to use. I can receive payments, keep up with my book keeping and reuse templets so it saves time. In my book, thats a WIN!! Thank you Honeybook for putting together a program that makes running a business easy and fun!

Review.Titre: Honeybook is extremely easy to use
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is extremely easy to use and serves all my needs for my consulting business. It tracks all of the correspondence, contracts, payments, etc. As a business strategist, I also love sharing Honeybook with clients and helping them to use a system that help manage daily operations in their business.

Review.Titre: Honeybook has been an absolute…
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has been an absolute game-changer for my business. I couldn't begin to calculate the time it has saved me! I love having everything in one place, and it's impossible to miss a step in my workflow now (yey!) Thanks for the best system ever with awesome customer service:)

Review.Titre: Honeybook = LIFE!!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has been an essential part of my business. My clients appreciate the ease of use and professional platform and I love being organized, getting paid and having e sign contracts. Not only would I recommend honeybook but I already have and do - to everyone. Honeybook also listens to its users. Regularly polling users on what they can do bette and asking for ideas on improvements. And unlike other companies, the changes are actually made! I love honeybook, my only regret is not having buying/knowing about it earlier!

Review.Titre: Only platform you need!!
Review.Contenu: Only platform you need when you start your business. And you can make client WOW how professional you are!!! Worth every penny!!!

Review.Titre: Honeybook was a game changer for me
Review.Contenu: Honeybook was a game changer for me. Helps keep me organized, and also creates a great experience for my clients. I love that there’s an app to easily check projects & respond to customers. I’m very happy I went with my experience thus far.

Review.Titre: My clients are pleased, and my life is easier with Honeybook!
Review.Contenu: My clients are always very pleased with how simple the process is with, questionnaire, brochure, contracts, messages, reminders - the entire experiences. It helps me look professional, and makes things SO easy for me! I also very much appreciate the customer service in the chat box.

Review.Titre: I’ve been using HoneyBook for over a…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using HoneyBook for over a year now and don’t know what I would do without it! It’s completely streamlined everything from contracts to proposals, and being able to except online payments. My clients say they love it!

Review.Titre: I love everything about honeybook...
Review.Contenu: I love how everything is housed on honeybook. This year I’ve been the busiest I’ve ever been and it’s so nice to be able to open the app and see all of the project information in one organized place. Another huge sell for me was being able to bill and accept payments online.

Review.Titre: Simple interface and detailed
Review.Contenu: Simple interface and detailed, functional design.  Since using HB I have seen my business grow professionally and have benefitted greatly from all it offers. Clients find it a breeze from forms, to contracts, to payments. Never looking back!

Review.Titre: Honeybook has improved my business SO MUCH!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has made my organization in my business SO much better as well as helped me provide the best client experience that I can! It has been such a game changer in the way I do things and I'm so thankful for this platform. Looking forward to many more years with honeybook!

Review.Titre: I absolutely love this platform
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love this platform. It makes running a business so smooth. I highly recommend HoneBook!

Review.Titre: Honeybook = AMAZING!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has been a game changer for my small photography & design business. It has helped me establish a better workflow and allows me to send contracts and invoices and collect payments from clients with ease. The customizable templates are amazing. So grateful for how Honeybook has allowed me to have more free time to improve other aspects of my business and focus on doing the work I love!

Review.Titre: Highly recommend!! Saves me time and stress, keeps me organized!
Review.Contenu: I've been using honeybook for over a year now, and I love it!!!! I had an issue with emails at one point and their team did everything they could to quickly fix it for me. They are always there right away to answer any questions you have, and the system is amazing. I don't know how I managed anything before I joined haha It has saved me time, stress, and kept me totally organized!

Review.Titre: Fast and kind as always!
Review.Contenu: The response from customer service was so fast and kind! My questions were answered in detail and she made sure that I understood everything she shared. Always a 10 out of 10 with HoneyBook!

Review.Titre: Honestly so helpful!!!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook changed my business completely! I’m not the busiest photographer, but I still think it is 100% worth it with how easy it is for me and my clients. Literally no stress with it. Signing contracts and paying and as well as emails and a calendar in one spot is sooo nice! Would recommend to everyone ever lol.

Review.Titre: I have know idea where I'd be without Honeybook!
Review.Contenu: I have know idea where I'd be without Honeybook. I've been using Honeybook for a few years now and this client management software has been my saving grace when it comes to keeping my contracts, meetings, brochures, and client messages all in one place. My couples not only love how easy it is to use Honeybook, but how it makes their client experience even more seamless! I can't thank Honeybook enough for always answering questions and for also always developing and implementing new features.

Review.Titre: I LOVE Honeybook
Review.Contenu: I LOVE Honeybook. It has changed my life, I have time to spend with my family that I would normally be doing office work. It keeps my projects organized and ready for event day! All my payments are done without me having to work to get them. Reminders send on their own and I am booking with the professional look that I want.

Review.Titre: We couldn't run our business without Honeybook
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is our business one-stop shop that helps us run a smooth operation from first client contact, all the way to onboarding and offboarding. We couldn't do what we do without Honeybook!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is one of the best…
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is one of the best investments that I’ve made in my business! Makes the whole booking process simple and streamlined for clients and is easy to navigate. Their customer service is always super helpful which is a huge plus! Worth every penny.

Review.Titre: This system has save me SOOOOO much…
Review.Contenu: This system has save me SOOOOO much time! Everything from the beginning of the project to the end is all in one place. You can stay organized with every client and always know exactly what the next step is. I can't even imagine how much more time I would have on my plate if I didn't have this incredible system in my life!

Review.Titre: Honeybook is incredible!!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is incredible! I was able to double my clientele and feel so much less stressed than last year! Their team is amazing and always ready to go above and beyond! Would 100% recommend to anyone! Changed my business!!

Review.Titre: I don't know what I'd do without HoneyBook!
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook has COMPLETELY transformed my business! I truly don't know how I would function without it! HoneyBook keeps me organized, helps me to track all of the information I need, & is very professional! I'll continue to share HoneyBook with anyone I can!

Review.Titre: Highly Recommend!
Review.Contenu: Love, love, love Honeybook for my small business! I've used other CMS and nothing ever had everything I needed. Honeybook has it all plus more! Not to mention, it's beautiful. I would recommend Honeybook to anyone!

Review.Titre: Honeybook is amazing
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is amazing! It works beautifully 'out of the gate', but my favorite thing about this client management software is how quickly suggestions and requests for change are responded to and how seamlessly new features are incorporated into the software. Although, I am still waiting for a more efficient way to organize client contacts vs vendor contacts (Hint) Thank you so much! Honeybook really is a class above the rest.

Review.Titre: An invaluable asset!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook has saved me so much time and stress. I used to stress over contracts, making sure they were signed and sent back, recorded and saved, etc. My process was slow and I always feared losing something or forgetting to follow up. That was the original reason I joined Honeybook - and it immediately paid for itself! Later, I began to integrate all of the features, from automating emails and workflow, to sending questionnaires and brochures, keeping up with my bookkeeping, and following up with clients who would otherwise slip through the cracks... This system is invaluable to me and my business! I feel like I have a virtual assistant taking care of all the parts of my business that I didn't enjoy. Thank you, Honeybook!!

Review.Titre: HoneyBook is the best thing I had for…
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook is the best thing I had for my business . It is amazing program that made my job so easy. I recommend for any business owners in the weddings market. Thank you so much HoneyBook for keeping me focused, organized and energetic in my daily business.

Review.Titre: Best client management of your dreams
Review.Contenu: Best client management of your dreams! Before honeybook, I used to have all m contracts on google doc and use a free add-on to receive signatures from my clients. All the messages, emails, contracts and timelines were literally everywhere! I felt like a chaotic mess and didn’t have my sh** together. I saw another photographer I love say great things about honey book and I took the splurge to try it out and to be honest, I don’t know any other way to organize my business! Honeybook automatically takes information from my contact form and put it in for me. Yup. They also extracted my google doc contract and put it in their system. What!? I didn’t have to type a word. They also connect your business email so all your client messages, contracts, details are all in one place. I feel so confident sending my clients contracts and yup they take payment as well. Now I feel like I got this and can continue spending my time on shooting and editing!

Review.Titre: Everything I need in one place!
Review.Contenu: While it’s taking me some time to get acclimated to this platform, I love all that it can do to help streamline my intake and management processes.

Review.Titre: AMAZING!
Review.Contenu: AMAZING!! Has helped in increase my income because it has saved me so much time. My clients love the experience using it and helps them feel the level of professionalism that I like to carry with all my work. Thank you HoneyBook!

Review.Titre: I love Honeybook because it gives my…
Review.Contenu: I love Honeybook because it helps bring sanity to an insane business!  My team books and manages several venues and this is the only way we can keep everything organized.  THANK YOU HONEYBOOK!!!!!

Review.Titre: First try
Review.Contenu: I have just started using it. Sent my first invoice, proposal, contract and got a deposit!.  I still have alot to learn but I am elated that I was able to maneuver through it and make it happen. I lovvvve it

Review.Titre: Honeybook is a life saver!
Review.Contenu: Honeybook is a life saver!! I went from being a disorganized mess with a million tracking documents (none of which actually helped me properly keep track of anything), to having my life in ORDER! My clients love that they can easily sign contracts and pay online, and I love that I now have a streamlined, customized workflow. I also love the automatic payment reminders that get sent to clients on my behalf, cause it elevates the client experience without me having to feel salesy and ask people to make payments! ;)

Review.Titre: I have been using Honeybook for over…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Honeybook for over three years now, and it has been my rock-solid partner throughout this journey. As a photographer and coach, managing clients and their needs can be a handful, but Honeybook has truly revolutionized my workflow. I can confidently say that I wouldn't choose any other platform at this point.From the very first inquiry to finalizing payments, contracts, onboarding, and even client reviews, Honeybook effortlessly handles it all. This all-in-one platform has become my go-to solution for managing both my photography and coaching clients. The level of organization it brings to my business is unparalleled, and having everything neatly organized in one place is an absolute game-changer!

Review.Titre: Honey Book streamlined my company's…
Review.Contenu: Honey Book streamlined my company's sales and service process.  From when we receive a lead all the way until we collect a review it does it all.   They update their product to be what we need in the wedding and event industry.

Review.Titre: HoneyBook provides fantastic customer…
Review.Contenu: HoneyBook provides fantastic customer service.  It is an amazing application.  It has improved my life and business processes tremendously.  Don't hesitate.  Get it now.  You will be so glad you did.

Review.Titre: I've started charging more for my services!
Review.Contenu: So easy it is to automate communication with clients! I have a new level of confidence now knowing how professional and seamless my client's total experience is. I've started charging more for my services and saying no to clients who aren't the right fit. Business is great!

Review.Titre: I love using honeybook
Review.Contenu: I love using honeybook - it has kept my business leads organized and easy to follow up with in a timely manner.  I also enjoy the bookkeeping feature, so I can keep track of when all my payments are coming in.

Review.Titre: Honeybook helps keep everything organized
Review.Contenu: Honeybook helps keep everything organized. It has all my brochures, invoices, contracts, emails, etc. It is just what I needed for my Photography business.

Review.Titre: I have used HoneyBook for over 5 years…
Review.Contenu: I have used HoneyBook for over 5 years and couldn't imagine doing business without it. Highly recommend for any small business looking to stay organized!

Review.Titre: liking honeybook so far
Review.Contenu: liking honeybook so far.  affordable, pretty easy to use, and can do just about everything I've needed.

Review.Titre: Honeybook does more work than a full time employee
Review.Contenu: I would not be able to manage all the work I am getting in a responsible way if it weren't for Honeybook. It's one of my largest annual investments and is well worth it. Plus it keeps getting better!

Review.Titre: Save yourself the insanity and sign up for Honeybook.
Review.Contenu: I don't even know what I would have done without HoneyBook, if I'm honest. See, I'm new to this whole Professional Photography thing...honestly, I'm new to the whole Professional Anything thing, so drafting contracts, putting together package offerings, sending out invoices, collecting payments...? I didn't even know where to begin. Trust me when I say it; the overwhelm was real. Enter Honeybook, the answer to my stretched-too-thin brains chaotic organization system...or lack thereof. Honeybook swept in and Marie Kondo-ed the shiz out of my business. Now, my Client Management system brings me so, so much joy. It's simple. It's streamlined. It looks good. It would probably smell nice if that was possible. Honestly, if Honeybook had an unattached humanoid brother, I would totally swipe right because these genetics are obviously good. So, thanks Honeybook. Not only did you design a beautiful system that allows both long-time professionals and newbies to get their business game right, but I would hazard to say that y'all have probably prevented a fair amount of nervous breakdowns amongst entrepreneurs. Personally, I can think of at least a half dozen late-night frustration cries your gorgeous software saved me from...who knew you were also a #mentalhealth and #selfcare company?Also, do you have a brother?
